name: Fantastic Marital Quarrel
description:
Fight as one of the spouses over who should clean the area of a failed experiment. Use your magical powers to push , block or spawn magical junk into the significant other's half of the map. Choose spells before the fight and experiment with combos!

You can play with PS4 / Xbox gamepad or keyboard. 

Made at Slavic Game Jam 2018

Makers:

Michał Ertner, Jacek Iwanicki - Programmers

Adam Małek - Visuals

Tymoteusz Witczak - SFX

Maciej Hernik - 3D Artist
